roleset.name: Working (of something)

role.descr: Explicit role (arg 1 is operating as what?)

roles.note: Other roles not seen in data, see entries for operate-v and operation for additional examples.

example.name: Arg0, Arg2
example.text: In a related matter , Peter Black , president of consumer brand Minwax , was named group vice president for the household products operating group .

roleset.note: Roleset based on noun entry operation.01. Framed by Claire.
